channel.title: Need Help Creating 562 Webclient
channel.description:
Greetings.
I'm in need of some help creating a 562 webclient. I downloaded jarmaker but when I create the jar file and try testing it (using the batch file), I get this error:
c:\windows\system32>java -jar client.jar Error: Unable to access jarfile client.jar Press any key to continue...
or
Error: Could not find or load main class client Press any key to continue...
When I run the jar file, nothing happens.
My Settings:
Output file: Desktop File name: client.jar Input Directory: C:\users\desktop\ricky\(my client folder) Main-Class: client
Not sure how to fix this but if you need anymore information or pictures, I will add them. Thank you for your time.

item.title: Need Help Creating 562 Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Rickymac6 Rickymac6
item.description:
@Rickymac6 wrote:

Greetings.

I’m in need of some help creating a 562 webclient. I downloaded jarmaker but when I create the jar file and try testing it (using the batch file), I get this error:

c:\windows\system32>java -jar client.jar
Error: Unable to access jarfile client.jar
Press any key to continue…

or

Error: Could not find or load main class client
Press any key to continue…

When I run the jar file, nothing happens.

My Settings:

File name: client.jar
Input Directory: C:\users\desktop\ricky(my client folder)

Not sure how to fix this but if you need anymore information or pictures, I will add them.
Thank you for your time.
